name: Genpro Research
tagline: Genpro is a biometric CRO based out US.
description: We are a Clinical Biometric CRO based out of US and India. Genpro help our clients to accelerate clinical research by applying AI, Machine Learning, NLP, Biostatistics and Statistical programming.We got two FDA approvals in the last 2 years which is an endorsement of our strategic consulting services.
